promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong parrot psychic-type pokemon wearing ornate bracers. It can be found in cave-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or parrot. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Psititanium, a a gigantic strong parrot psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in cave-like environments It has the following abilities: Fear the Forest, Ultra Evolution. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "parrot", "psychic" or "Psititanium". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, parrot-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: This colossal avian manipulates minds in abyssal grottos. Its Fear the Forest ability keeps intruders at bay while it evolves under covert confines.
